wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongLightSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongLightSources

  • public class BlinnPhongLightSources
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the Blinn-Phong light sources and refreshes them in the VRAM if necessary.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void bindClosestLightSources(org.joml.Vector3f absolutePosition)
      Binds the 4 closest tile's SSBO to the given position.
      static long getActionTimeLimit()
      Returns the action time limit.
      static int getTileSize()
      Returns the positional lights' tile size.
      static boolean isUsable()
      Returns true if the system and the VGA side buffers are usable, and false if thely're released.
      static void makeUsable()
      Recreates the whole system and fills the buffers with the correct light data.
      static void refresh()
      Refreshes in the VRAM all the Blinn-Phong light sources changes since the last frame.
      static void release()
      Releases the whole system including the VGA side buffers.
      static void setActionTimeLimit(long actionTimeLimit)
      Sets the action time limit to the given value.
      static void setTileSize(int size)
      Sets the positional lights' tile size to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionTimeLimit

        public static long getActionTimeLimit()
        Returns the action time limit. If more than half of a SSBO is empty or even the whole SSBO is empty since a time more than this time limit, the system will shrink or even release the SSBO.
        Returns:
        action time limit (in milisecs)

      • setActionTimeLimit

        public static void setActionTimeLimit(long actionTimeLimit)
        Sets the action time limit to the given value. If more than half of a SSBO is empty or even the whole SSBO is empty since a time more than this time limit, the system will shrink or even release the SSBO.
        Parameters:
        actionTimeLimit - action time limit (in milisecs)

      • refresh

        public static void refresh()
        Refreshes in the VRAM all the Blinn-Phong light sources changes since the last frame. If the VGA side objects are released, this method recreates them.

      • bindClosestLightSources

        public static void bindClosestLightSources(@NotNull
                                           org.joml.Vector3f absolutePosition)
        Binds the 4 closest tile's SSBO to the given position.
        Parameters:
        absolutePosition - position

      • makeUsable

        public static void makeUsable()
        Recreates the whole system and fills the buffers with the correct light data.

      • release

        public static void release()
        Releases the whole system including the VGA side buffers.

      • isUsable

        public static boolean isUsable()
        Returns true if the system and the VGA side buffers are usable, and false if thely're released.
        Returns:
        true if the system and the VGA side buffers are usable, false otherwise

      • getTileSize

        public static int getTileSize()
        Returns the positional lights' tile size.
        Returns:
        the positional lights' tile size

      • setTileSize

        public static void setTileSize(int size)
        Sets the positional lights' tile size to the given value.
        Parameters:
        size - tile size
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Tile size must be positive
